channel.title: Looking for hoster!
channel.description: Okay i coded a sever and and still coding forums but the only thing i can't do is host the server. I can host it on hamachi but i'd rather have it a no-ip server. anyone who will host for me will get Owner on server and Admin on forums. You can contact me at littlepimp7@hotmail.com
